<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>King Parka did not know that the name

19648.zh-Hant:

所以我一直很想告訴他這件事。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>Do royalty and people all have the
